Posts.Content: Oct 20, 2009 03:04PM suthrnatheart wrote: Ok, so I went to the doctors today and he found a 1cm lump on my right breast. He told me he wishes he could tell me it was a fiberous cyst and not cancer because I am only 29 but he can't (that is exactly how he worded it to me). I am scheduled for a mammogram and ultrasound thursday at 10:30am. I called my mom and told her and I was right, she wanted to go into panic mode. But I think she is ok now. I wanted to wait until after the mammogram but I promised my boyfriend I'd tell her if the doctor did in fact find a lump. She is 500 miles away and I knew it would be hard for her. Haha, I'm trying not to worry and I am worried how my mom is. So I am trying to just focus on getting till Thursday. They didn't schedule a follow up so I am guessing that I will find something out Thursday. I
Posts.Title: nervous young mom suthrnatheart Lauren3

Posts.Content: Oct 22, 2009 06:07AM suthrnatheart wrote: Today is my mammogram and ultasound - I will post later if I find anything out.
Posts.Title: nervous young mom suthrnatheart Lauren3

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2009 12:34PM suthrnatheart wrote: I totally agree and I am so glad it is working for you and I pray that it continues.  and thank you again for for the info. I hopefully have nothing to worry about but I have never had any problems with my breasts and its scary not knowing.
Posts.Title: nervous young mom suthrnatheart Lauren3

Posts.Content: Oct 19, 2009 12:23PM suthrnatheart wrote: Thank you, I was happy to find this forum because I don't want to worry my friends and family unless the doctor says different. Also - I see you are on Lupron. How long have you been on it and have you had any issues? I was on it for a year before my histerectomy and have been having bone and joint pain that my doctor says may be a longterm side effect from the Lupron. I haven't met anyone else that has been on it so I was just curious.
Posts.Title: nervous young mom suthrnatheart Lauren3

Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2009 06:55AM suthrnatheart wrote: Thank you all so much!  It is such a blessing to see the words of encouragement and know I am not alone. I will definatly let everyone know how it goes and I am praying for all of you and sending positive thoughts to everyone too.
Posts.Title: nervous young mom suthrnatheart Lauren3

Posts.Content: Oct 22, 2009 12:00PM suthrnatheart wrote: Thank you everybody for the thoughts and prayers. I had my mammogram (and I'm sorry, but ouch doesn't even come close to explaining that pain) and ultrasound and they could see an area of thickening but could not find the lump that the doctor found at my exam!!!!! The radiologist doesn't think there is any reason to worry about the thickening.  Thank you!!! I also want to say that I will continue to pray for everyone here because I couldn't even begin to imagine how I would have felt if the results were different and I want to offer my thoughts and prayers to anyone who goes through that.
Posts.Title: nervous young mom suthrnatheart Lauren3
